description: This file defines a MapStruct mapper interface for converting between User entity objects and User DTOs in a Java Spring application.

classes.name: UserMapper
classes.description: A MapStruct mapper interface for converting between User entities and User DTOs, configured for Spring component model.

methods.name: toEntity
methods.description: Converts a User Response DTO to a User entity, ignoring the passwordHash field.

methods.name: toDto
methods.description: Converts a User entity to a User Response DTO.
